#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, n, i, sPt, cPt, sSubPt, cSubPt;
	char *A;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d", &n );
		A = new char[ n + 1 ];

		scanf("%s", A );

		sPt = cPt = sSubPt = cSubPt = 0;
	
		for( i = 0;A[ i ];i++ ) {
				
			if( A[ i ] == 'S' ) {
				
				switch( sSubPt ) {
					
					case 0 : 	sSubPt = 15;
					break;
									
					case 15 : 	sSubPt = 30;
					break;

					case 30 : 	sSubPt = 40;
					break;

					case 40 : 	sSubPt = 0;
								sPt++;
								cSubPt = 0;
					break;

				}			
			}
			else {
				
				switch( cSubPt ) {
					
					case 0 : 	cSubPt = 15;
					break;
									
					case 15 : 	cSubPt = 30;
					break;

					case 30 : 	cSubPt = 40;
					break;

					case 40 : 	cSubPt = 0;
								cPt++;
								sSubPt = 0;
					break;

				}			
			}
		}

		printf("%d-%d", sPt, cPt );

		if( ( sSubPt == 0 ) && ( cSubPt == 0 ) )
			printf("\n");
		else
			printf(",%d-%d\n", sSubPt, cSubPt );

		delete A;			
	}

	return 0;
}
